title: QR Code Reader Download
text: QR code reader scans different type of formats by using your mobile phone's camera and quickly recognize the code and display result. Out tool has also built-in QR code generator to generate your own QR code from text to save it or share it with anyone on any social media platform. Open QR code Reader app and focus camera on QR/Bar code, our engine will automatically detects if the QR code contains a text, email, URL and phone number, and the tool will take the necessary action. If your Qr code contains email contact,the [Add to contact] button will be displayed. If you scan a website link then the [Open in web browser] button will be displayed. QR Code Reader recognizes all of the popular barcode types (UPC, EAN, and ISBN), text, URL, contact, calendar, email, location, Wi-Fi and many other formats. The app will show you pricing, reviews, and more about any products you scan. Our All-in-one free app includes QR code reader / QR code scanner / Barcode scanner / Barcode generator / QR code generator / Barcode reader / QR scanner. QR Code Reader Main Features: Scans instantly. Scan history. Easy to use. Barcode Scanner. Flashlight supported for low-light environments. Powerful scanning engine. Take appropriate action. Generate, save, share your own QR code. Read many data format.
